item.description:
@TruezoneGaming wrote:

No guys, what it is. Is that you have it under the owner commands area. Just copy the code and delete it from that area then scroll up til you find

Place it under the first command which should be alert and compile, restart and you’re set.

P.S. I just made a new account for you lol.

item.title: Hybrid Pvp v3 Making ::item For admins
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

There should be like 4 sections to commands.java thing. Player, mod, admin and owner. Under each of those goes the commands for that type of player right. So put it in the area around the admin commands. That should work unless its not PI without the right commands.java that I’m thinking of. Saying that your command doesn’t have the playerRights == 3 I’m guessing thats how its set up.

item.title: Hybrid Pvp v3 Making ::item For admins
item.dc:creator: @reward reward
item.description:
@reward wrote:

[quote=“ShAuNyShAuN, post:1, topic:397977”]Hey, i’m having a real bad trouble trying to get the admins to spawn on the hybrid pvp v3 source
Now… i got into commands.java and scroll down till i see this

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
			}[/code]

Now, how do i make it so admins can spawn :D?

NOTE… I MAY HAVE JUST STARTED TODAY BUT I CAN’T REMEMBER MY OTHER ACCOUNTS DETAILS LOL AND I’M NEW TO CODING SO PLEASE BE NICE XD[/quote]
replace

With

(Assuming that Admin Rank is Rights 2, if not change it to yours. If you wish to make it admin+ (admin, co-owner and owner)

Read full topic

@ShAuNyShAuN wrote:

Hey, i’m having a real bad trouble trying to get the admins to spawn on the hybrid pvp v3 source
Now… i got into commands.java and scroll down till i see this

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
			}[/code]

Now, how do i make it so admins can spawn :D?
